mapper.select: SELECT NEWS_BOARD_ID, NEWS_BOARD_IMAGE_ROUTE, NEWS_BOARD_IMAGE_NAME, NEWS_BOARD_IMAGE_EXTENTION, NEWS_BOARD_VIEW_COUNT, NEWS_BOARD_TITLE, NEWS_BOARD_REG_DATE FROM NEWS_BOARD WHERE NEWS_BOARD TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
SELECT NEWS_BOARD_ID, NEWS_BOARD_IMAGE_ROUTE, NEWS_BOARD_IMAGE_NAME, NEWS_BOARD_IMAGE_EXTENTION, NEWS_BOARD_VIEW_COUNT, NEWS_BOARD_TITLE, NEWS_BOARD_REG_DATE FROM NEWS_BOARD;

SELECT A.NEWS_BOARD_ID, A.NEWS_BOARD_VIEW_COUNT, A.NEWS_BOARD_TITLE, A.NEWS_BOARD_REG_DATE, B.NEWS_BOARD_DETAIL_ID, B.NEWS_BOARD_DETAIL_IMAGE_ROUTE, B.NEWS_BOARD_DETAIL_IMAGE_NAME, B.NEWS_BOARD_DETAIL_IMAGE_EXTENTION FROM NEWS_BOARD A JOIN NEWS_BOARD_DETAIL B ON (A.NEWS_BOARD_ID = B.NEWS_BOARD_DETAIL_ID) WHERE A.NEWS_BOARD_ID >= #{index}-1 AND A.NEWS_BOARD_ID <= #{index}+1
mapper.update: UPDATE NEWS_BOARD SET NEWS_BOARD_VIEW_COUNT = IFNULL(NEWS_BOARD_VIEW_COUNT,0)+1 WHERE NEWS_BOARD_ID = #{index}
